name: AstronoPy
tagline: An astrophysics computation package for Python.
body:
### AstronoPy
**AstronoPy** is an astrophysics computation package for Python, relying on [Numpy](http://www.numpy.org) and [SciPy](http://www.scipy.org/)

Just plug and play:

```
import numpy as np
import scipy as sp
import convert as conv
import constants as const
import module as astro
```

### Documentation
Coming soon.

### Authors and Contributors
AstronoPy is maintained by @amritrau and @Pluvial.
